title: Patrick J. Murphy Joins CleanSlate Centers As The New Chief Financial Officer
content:
SOURCE CleanSlate Centers

NORTHAMPTON, Mass. 

"Patrick is a superb addition to CleanSlate's executive team," says Amanda Wilson 

Before joining CleanSlate, Murphy was one of the Founders at Women's Health USA 

"It has been a pleasure and an honor to begin my new role as CFO at CleanSlate," said Murphy. "The work we are doing and the care we provide could not be more important. It's a privelege to come to work each day for a company dedicated to providing such vital and necessary treatment." 

About CleanSlate Centers 

CleanSlate Centers was founded in 2009 in response to the growing opioid epidemic facing the country. A network of outpatient addiction treatment centers, CleanSlate provides effective, award-winning medication assisted treatment and related therapies for patients who have addiction and associated disorders using the highest quality, evidence based practices.
